(오직 M1A1 AIM 호주 에이브람스 만 사용 가능합니다)

...

Realistic APX-M590 VAB MEPHISTO sight.

2 versions:
Realistic sight without telemeter (no telemetry indication in the real sight).
Adapted version with telemeter.

no preference to use: gunner's optic is placed at the same place than "standard" sniper view.

All versions haven't mobile componant (exterior circle: hull directionnal indicator).

The folder fr_vcac_mephisto is inclued in the download.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-vis...

Fourth request from Ohntdc_Mend(sana?), a sight from Daeboms maus

Check out Daeboms channel on youtube he makes a lot of good Tank waifus. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrVHlmiR7R5iZtn6zvkYLfg/videos

Here is a quick fix for the AH-1Gs. I tried to make them as accurate as possible.

Yes, the images will repeat vertically and horizontally. There is no way to fix that.

Yes, there is a difference between the American and Israel AH-1G sights.
(The Israel AH-1G has a slightly higher rocket point of impact because the rocket pods are aiming slightly higher.)

I wrote simple instructions on how to replace the gyroscopic image if you don't want a captain falcon chibi floating around and want something different.

These sights were sighted in with no gun targeting distance.

#ah1g #heli...

The folder containing :
- a sight
- a tutorial

ENJOY !!!

Альтернативный прицел для всех видов техники с зеленой и неоновой сеткой, а так же добавлены с синей фиолетовой малиновой красной. Не требует лишних действий просто кидаешь содержимое в папку \WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks, выставляешь в игре в настройках этот прицел и радуешься жизни!

BMP-2M grenade launcher
#bmp2m #bmp_2m

当前版本：2.17.0.11 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

新载具都做了


Current version: 2.17.0.11 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097...

#ztz_99a #sight #ztz99a #china

Illustration: The sight structure has cited from the post of #Front_Wind. For instance, I have used it to create a sight for ZTZ-99A.

我做了一个99A的自定义瞄具，适用于War thunder 2.17 新版本。本瞄具默认各位战狼直接氪出完全体。冲鸭！

Дорогие русские товарищи!

Это специальный прицел наводчика танков ZTZ-99A. Надеюсь, товарищи получат удовольствие от игры. Выражаю Вам свое глубокое уважение и сердечные пожелания. Неудача не принадлежит пролетариату, Ура!

Hi everyone,

I have made a gunner sight for ZTZ-99A. Hoping you can enjoy it. Moreover, appreciate for any comments.

Best wishes,
